languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, Главный кормчий Равор на связи. Тут экипаж шум поднял, но не без причины — наши системы аналитики спятили. Хотя красноряс... хм, простите, техножрецы называют это гневом машинных духов. Мол, так они проявляют свое недовольство в ответ на недостаточно почтительное обращение команды. Нам, в основном, удалось стабилизировать показатели авгуров и ауспексов по всему кораблю, но вы должны знать, что с машинами на судне творится что-то мутное".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, Главный кормчий Равор на связи. Тут экипаж шум поднял, но не без причины — наши системы аналитики спятили. Хотя красноряс... хм, простите, техножрецы называют это гневом машинных духов. Мол, так они проявляют свое недовольство в ответ на недостаточно почтительное обращение команды. Нам, в основном, удалось стабилизировать показатели авгуров и ауспексов по всему кораблю, но вы должны знать, что с машинами на судне творится что-то мутное".

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, this is Master Helmsman Ravor. The crew is grumbling again, but they've a right reason this time — our analytics systems have gone totally bonkers. The red robes... excuse me, Tech-Priests are blaming the anger of the machine spirits. Allegedly, this is how they profess their displeasure at the crew not being worshipful. We have largely managed to stabilise the output of the augurs and auspexes across the ship, but you should know there is something awfully sketchy about the machines these days."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, Главный кормчий Равор на связи. Тут экипаж шум поднял, но не без причины — наши системы аналитики спятили. Хотя красноряс... хм, простите, техножрецы называют это гневом машинных духов. Мол, так они проявляют свое недовольство в ответ на недостаточно почтительное обращение команды. Нам, в основном, удалось стабилизировать показатели авгуров и ауспексов по всему кораблю, но вы должны знать, что с машинами на судне творится что-то мутное".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, this is Chief Helmsman Ravor. The crew is making noises, but they have a reason this time — our analytics systems have gone bonkers. The red robes... excuse me, tech-priests are blaming the anger of the machine spirits. Allegedly this is how they profess their displeasure at the crew not being worshipful. We have largely managed to stabilize the output of the augurs and auspexes across the ship, but you should know there is something sketchy about the machines these days."

"Lord Captain, this is Chief Helmsman Ravor. The crew is making noises, but they have a reason this time — our analytics systems have gone bonkers. The red robes... excuse me, tech-priests are blaming the anger of the machine spirits. Allegedly this is how they profess their displeasure at the crew not being worshipful. We have largely managed to stabilize the output of the augurs and auspexes across the ship, but you should know there is something sketchy about the machines these days."

We have largely managed to stabilise the output of the augurs and auspexes across the ship, but you should know there is something awfully sketchy about the machines these days."

"Lord Captain, this is Chief Helmsman Ravor. The crew is grumbling again, but they've a right reason this time — our analytics systems have gone totally bonkers. "Lord Cap'n, this is Master Helmsman Ravor. The crew is grumbling again, but they've a right reason this time — our analytics systems have gone totally bonkers. The red robes... excuse me, Tech-Priests are blaming the anger of the machine spirits. Allegedly, this is how they profess their displeasure at the crew not being worshipful. We have largely managed to stabilise the output of the augurs and auspexes across the ship, but you should know there is something awfully sketchy about the machines these days."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, ici le maître timonier Ravor. La grogne monte encore dans les rangs, mais les mécontents ont peut-être une raison valable, cette fois : nos systèmes d'analyse ont complètement perdu la boule. Les robes rouges... pardonnez-moi, les technoprêtres imputent le phénomène à la colère des esprits de la machine. Ce serait, soi-disant, l'expression de leur colère contre l'équipage, qu'ils jugeraient "insuffisamment pieux". Nous avons réussi à stabiliser tant bien que mal le fonctionnement des augures et des auspex, mais l'état de nos machines m'inquiète énormément, et il devrait vous inquiéter également. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, this is Master Helmsman Ravor. The crew is grumbling again, but they've a right reason this time — our analytics systems have gone totally bonkers. The red robes... excuse me, Tech-Priests are blaming the anger of the machine spirits. Allegedly, this is how they profess their displeasure at the crew not being worshipful. We have largely managed to stabilise the output of the augurs and auspexes across the ship, but you should know there is something awfully sketchy about the machines these days."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, ici le maître timonier Ravor. La grogne monte encore dans les rangs, mais les mécontents ont peut-être une raison valable, cette fois : nos systèmes d'analyse ont complètement perdu la boule. Les robes rouges... pardonnez-moi, les technoprêtres imputent le phénomène à la colère des esprits de la machine. Ce serait, soi-disant, l'expression de leur colère contre l'équipage, qu'ils jugeraient "insuffisamment pieux". Nous avons réussi à stabiliser tant bien que mal le fonctionnement des augures et des auspex, mais l'état de nos machines m'inquiète énormément, et il devrait vous inquiéter également. »

languages.text: “船长老大，我是舵手长雷沃。那些船员又在抱怨了，不过他们这次抱怨得没错。我们的分析系统彻底疯球了，那些红袍子……呃，我是说，那些技术神甫说这场事故是由于机魂发怒导致的。据说，要是有哪些船员对它们不虔诚，它们就会这么耍脾气。我们基本已经稳定了整艘船的俄歇矩阵和鸟卜仪的扫描问题，但你应该知道，这些机器最近有点不太对劲。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, this is Master Helmsman Ravor. The crew is grumbling again, but they've a right reason this time — our analytics systems have gone totally bonkers. The red robes... excuse me, Tech-Priests are blaming the anger of the machine spirits. Allegedly, this is how they profess their displeasure at the crew not being worshipful. We have largely managed to stabilise the output of the augurs and auspexes across the ship, but you should know there is something awfully sketchy about the machines these days."

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，我是舵手长雷沃。那些船员又在抱怨了，不过他们这次抱怨得没错。我们的分析系统彻底疯球了，那些红袍子……呃，我是说，那些技术神甫说这场事故是由于机魂发怒导致的。据说，要是有哪些船员对它们不虔诚，它们就会这么耍脾气。我们基本已经稳定了整艘船的俄歇矩阵和鸟卜仪的扫描问题，但你应该知道，这些机器最近有点不太对劲。”

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, hier spricht Hauptsteuermann Ravor. Die Crew ist wieder am Grummeln, diesmal aber zurecht. Unsere Analysesysteme spielen völlig verrückt. Die roten Roben ... Verzeihung, die Techpriester geben dem Zorn der Maschinengeister die Schuld. Offenbar verleihen sie so ihrer Verärgerung darüber Ausdruck, dass die Crew nicht gläubig genug ist. Es ist uns gelungen, den Output der Auguren und Auspizien auf dem Schiff größtenteils zu stabilisieren. Ihr solltet jedoch wissen, dass die Maschinen sich in letzter Zeit wirklich äußerst merkwürdig verhalten."
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, this is Master Helmsman Ravor. The crew is grumbling again, but they've a right reason this time — our analytics systems have gone totally bonkers. The red robes... excuse me, Tech-Priests are blaming the anger of the machine spirits. Allegedly, this is how they profess their displeasure at the crew not being worshipful. We have largely managed to stabilise the output of the augurs and auspexes across the ship, but you should know there is something awfully sketchy about the machines these days."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, hier spricht der leitende Steuermann Ravor. Die Crew ist wieder am Grummeln, diesmal aber zurecht. Unsere Analysesysteme spielen völlig verrückt. Die roten Roben ... Verzeihung, die Techpriester geben dem Zorn der Maschinengeister die Schuld. Offenbar verleihen sie so ihrer Verärgerung darüber Ausdruck, dass die Crew nicht gläubig genug ist. Es ist uns gelungen, den Output der Auguren und Auspizien auf dem Schiff größtenteils zu stabilisieren. Ihr solltet jedoch wissen, dass die Maschinen sich in letzter Zeit wirklich äußerst merkwürdig verhalten."

"Lord Captain, hier spricht der leitende Steuermann Ravor. Die Crew ist wieder am Grummeln, diesmal aber zurecht. Unsere Analysesysteme spielen völlig verrückt. Die roten Roben ... Verzeihung, die Techpriester geben dem Zorn der Maschinengeister die Schuld. Offenbar verleihen sie so ihrer Verärgerung darüber Ausdruck, dass die Crew nicht gläubig genug ist. Es ist uns gelungen, den Output der Auguren und Auspizien auf dem Schiff größtenteils zu stabilisieren. Ihr solltet jedoch wissen, dass die Maschinen sich in letzter Zeit wirklich äußerst merkwürdig verhalten."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, le habla el maestro timonel Ravor. Siguen llegando quejas de la tripulación, pero esta vez tienen una buena razón para ello, pues nuestro sistema de análisis ha enloquecido por completo. Los túnicas rojas... digo, los tecnosacerdotes le echan la culpa a la ira de los espíritus máquina. Por lo visto, es su forma de expresar su descontento a la tripulación por no ser lo suficientemente reverenciales. Hemos logrado estabilizar la producción de augures y auspexes en toda la nave, pero debe saber que las máquinas se están comportando de una forma terriblemente sospechosa estos días».
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, this is Master Helmsman Ravor. The crew is grumbling again, but they've a right reason this time — our analytics systems have gone totally bonkers. The red robes... excuse me, Tech-Priests are blaming the anger of the machine spirits. Allegedly, this is how they profess their displeasure at the crew not being worshipful. We have largely managed to stabilise the output of the augurs and auspexes across the ship, but you should know there is something awfully sketchy about the machines these days."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, le habla el maestro timonel Ravor. Siguen llegando quejas de la tripulación, pero esta vez tienen una buena razón para ello, pues nuestro sistema de análisis ha enloquecido por completo. Los túnicas rojas... digo, los tecnosacerdotes le echan la culpa a la ira de los espíritus máquina. Por lo visto, es su forma de expresar su descontento a la tripulación por no ser lo suficientemente reverenciales. Hemos logrado estabilizar la producción de augures y auspexes en toda la nave, pero debe saber que las máquinas se están comportando de una forma terriblemente sospechosa estos días».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、こちらはマスター・ヘルムスマン・ラヴォアです。飽きずにクルーが不満を漏らしていますが、今回の理由は正当です。分析システムが完全におかしくなっています。赤ローブの連中…もとい、技術司祭たちは機械精霊の怒りが原因だと言っています。話によると、こうやって精霊は信仰心の薄いクルーへの不満を表現するのだとか。なんとか船中のスキャナーとアウスペクスの出力をだいたいは安定させることができましたが、最近の機械はどうもお粗末なところがあるので、お見知りおきを」
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, this is Master Helmsman Ravor. The crew is grumbling again, but they've a right reason this time — our analytics systems have gone totally bonkers. The red robes... excuse me, Tech-Priests are blaming the anger of the machine spirits. Allegedly, this is how they profess their displeasure at the crew not being worshipful. We have largely managed to stabilise the output of the augurs and auspexes across the ship, but you should know there is something awfully sketchy about the machines these days."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、こちらはマスター・ヘルムスマン・ラヴォアです。飽きずにクルーが不満を漏らしていますが、今回の理由は正当です。分析システムが完全におかしくなっています。赤ローブの連中…もとい、技術司祭たちは機械精霊の怒りが原因だと言っています。話によると、こうやって精霊は信仰心の薄いクルーへの不満を表現するのだとか。なんとか船中のスキャナーとアウスペクスの出力をだいたいは安定させることができましたが、最近の機械はどうもお粗末なところがあるので、お見知りおきを」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Başserdümen Ravor konuşuyor. Mürettebat yine bir şeylerden şikâyet etmeye başladı ama bu sefer haklı bir sebepleri var. Analitik sistemlerimiz iyice saçmalamaya başladı. Kırmızı cübbeliler... Yani Tekno Rahipler, makine ruhlarının öfkesini sorumlu tutuyor. Dediklerine göre mürettebatın yeterince ibadette bulunmamasının bir sonucuymuş. Gemi boyunca alametlerin ve uzgörenlerin çıktılarını stabilize etmeyi büyük ölçüde başardık ancak makinelerde bugünlerde acayip tuhaf bir şeyler olduğunu da bilmenizi isterim."
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, this is Master Helmsman Ravor. The crew is grumbling again, but they've a right reason this time — our analytics systems have gone totally bonkers. The red robes... excuse me, Tech-Priests are blaming the anger of the machine spirits. Allegedly, this is how they profess their displeasure at the crew not being worshipful. We have largely managed to stabilise the output of the augurs and auspexes across the ship, but you should know there is something awfully sketchy about the machines these days."
